body_html:
Stumbled upon the same error.

System information

Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow): No
OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): Ubuntu 16.04
TensorFlow installed from (source or binary): Source
TensorFlow version (use command below): r1.4.1
Python version: 2.7.14 Anaconda
Bazel version (if compiling from source): 0.5.4
GCC/Compiler version (if compiling from source): 4.8
CUDA/cuDNN version: N/A
GPU model and memory: N/A

**Exact command to reproduce:**
bazel build --verbose_failures --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

Describe the problem

TensorFlow fails to build with MPI with the following error:

ERROR: /home/singletron/source/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/mpi_collectives/BUILD:40:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '//tensorflow/contrib/mpi_collectives:python/ops/_mpi_ops.so':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'tensorflow/contrib/mpi_collectives/kernels/mpi_ops.cc':
'/home/singletron/source/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/lib/statusor.h'
'/home/singletron/source/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/platform/port.h'
'/home/singletron/source/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/lib/error.h'
'/home/singletron/source/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/lib/status.h'
'/home/singletron/source/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/lib/stringpiece.h'
'/home/singletron/source/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/platform/logging.h'
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
INFO: Elapsed time: 871.316s, Critical Path: 50.18s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully

body:
Stumbled upon the same error.

**System information**

    Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow): No
    OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): Ubuntu 16.04
    TensorFlow installed from (source or binary): Source
    TensorFlow version (use command below): r1.4.1
    Python version: 2.7.14 Anaconda
    Bazel version (if compiling from source): 0.5.4
    GCC/Compiler version (if compiling from source): 4.8
    CUDA/cuDNN version: N/A
    GPU model and memory: N/A

    **Exact command to reproduce:**
    bazel build --verbose_failures --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

**Describe the problem**

TensorFlow fails to build with MPI with the following error:

ERROR: /home/singletron/source/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/mpi_collectives/BUILD:40:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '//tensorflow/contrib/mpi_collectives:python/ops/_mpi_ops.so':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'tensorflow/contrib/mpi_collectives/kernels/mpi_ops.cc':
  '/home/singletron/source/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/lib/statusor.h'
  '/home/singletron/source/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/platform/port.h'
  '/home/singletron/source/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/lib/error.h'
  '/home/singletron/source/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/lib/status.h'
  '/home/singletron/source/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/lib/stringpiece.h'
  '/home/singletron/source/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/platform/logging.h'
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
INFO: Elapsed time: 871.316s, Critical Path: 50.18s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully
